page.title: 01Overview
page.content:
Our rectangle is probably the most crowded in the country. It contains major tourist attractions (The Tower of London, Tower Bridge), the financial capital of the World (the City), an area of unprecedented change (the London Docklands), a massive immigrant community in the East End, the Barbican Arts Centre and a treasure trove of archaeological and historical interest.
With only three schools participating it has been enormously difficult to gather and sift all the information, and then to portray accurately this wide ranging culture. Children of families from many nations have contributed, and this view of old and new London is predominantly through their eyes.
